        public boolean isValidConnectionForOutgoing(boolean considerQuit)
        Say whether current connection is valid for outgoing calls
        参数:
        considerQuit - pass true if we should consider app quitted as a reason to not consider available for outgoing
        返回:
        true if connection is valid

      • getCodecPriority

        public short getCodecPriority(java.lang.String codecName,
                              java.lang.String type,
                              java.lang.String defaultValue)
        Get the codec priority
        参数:
        codecName - codec name formated in the pjsip format (the corresponding pref is codec_{{lower(codecName)}}_{{codecFreq}})
        defaultValue - the default value if the pref is not found MUST be casteable as Integer/short
        返回:
        the priority of the codec as defined in preferences

      • setCodecPriority

        public void setCodecPriority(java.lang.String codecName,
                             java.lang.String type,
                             java.lang.String newValue)
        Set the priority for the codec for a given bandwidth type
        参数:
        codecName - the name of the codec as announced by codec
        type - bandwidth type
        For now, valid constants are : SipConfigManager.CODEC_NB and SipConfigManager.CODEC_WB
        newValue - Short value for preference as a string.

      • getRecordsFolder

        public static java.io.File getRecordsFolder(Context ctxt)
